name: Awesome Beauty Girl Fashion Dress Up Salon Maker Free
name_original: Awesome Beauty Girl Fashion Dress Up Salon Maker Free
description:
Hey Girl! High Five! Get ready to dress up your Beauty girls?!!

Now you can design your own AWESOME Fashion Styles like never before! This is the BEST dress up game in the app store!

Your own Beauty Fashion Salon to create styles that other girls will be jealous about!

Choose from all kinds of shirts, dresses, skirts, boots, and bags! Then you can even dazzle things up with jewelry! It's a total fashion makeover!

Download Beauty Girl Dress Up right now and start dressing your models!

PLEASE NOTE:
Awesome Beauty Girl Fashion Dress Up Salon Maker Free is free to play but in app purchases charges real money within the app. You can adjust your device settings to deactivate in app purchasing.
